text: IRay 7y TTHNf xifeasrut (Tsw5 9dev &r <TArf HT4, HRG  TRGFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) {7ra Tdt 0i-5 & 6, #r7-10, ERWT, #f @crl}t 110 075 = G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 TIY/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ HAM Projects /2022 Policy Circular No. 8.4.35/2022 dated 12th October, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No_ NHAI/ GM(F)/HAM/-Interest/2020 (Comp.No. 46658)} Sub.: Interest Rate Applicable for HAM Projects-Interest under clause 23.6.4- reg: This is with regard to the amended Model Concession Agreement for Hybrid Annuity Model Projects. As per the requirement of Article 23.6.4 "Interest shall be due and payable on the reducing balance of Completion Cost at an interest rate equal to the average of one year MCLR of top 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks plus 1..25% The foot note specifies that The Authority shall declare the list of 5 Schedule Commercial Bank on 1st September every calendar year based on the balance sheet size as declared in their annual reports,_ The year MCLR of the top 5 Scheduled commercial banks shall be taken at the start of every quarter". 2_ Accordingly, Authority hereby declare the 5 Schedule Commercial banks along with one year MCLR (Rate of Interest) applicable as on 1st Oct; 2022. The list of banks shall be next reviewed on 1st September 2023 and the rates shall be published for 1st day of every quarter. 3 The rates for the top 5 commercial banks are as below: Sr: No. Bank's Name One Year MCLR in % Average Rate Applicable for the period (As on 01.10.2022) 01.10.2022 to 31.12.2022 State Bank of India 7.70 2 HDFC Bank 8.20 3 ICICI Bank 8.10 7.91 % per annum PLUS 1.25% 4 Bank of Baroda 7.80 5 PNB 7.75 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 2jtolee (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
